9hf6n3.Python:
import requests

url = "https://api.microlink.io/"

querystring = {"url":"https://github.com/microlinkhq"}

response = requests.get(url, params=querystring)

print(response.json())
9hf6n3.Ruby:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("https://api.microlink.io/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fmicrolinkhq")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body
9hf6n3.PHP:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://api.microlink.io/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fmicrolinkhq",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}
9hf6n3.Golang:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://api.microlink.io/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fmicrolinkhq"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := io.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}
